channel.title: Additional Tools on フロー Spectools
channel.description: Recent content in Additional Tools on フロー Spectools

item.title: B E C
item.description: フロー furoBEC # The furo build essentials container. # This container contains all tools you need to work with a furo spec project. furoBEC on github Usage # Bash mode docker run -it --rm -v `pwd`:/specs thenorstroem/furo-bec # do your stuff # type exit to quit exit Command mode docker run -it --rm -v `pwd`:/specs thenorstroem/furo-bec build TIPP: If your spectools commands have to access different directories, do not forget to mount them.
